summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of The Alley in Block 10, Ladd's Second Addition to South Seattle, being the alley between 13th Avenue South and 14th Avenue South from Nevada Street to Oregon Street; and certain other streets and avenues, by paving, constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6017, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
